# how to use print() function to print data

```{r print}

a <- "my name is hitesh"

print(a)


### how to use paste() function to combine diffrent strings 



print(paste("my name", "is hitesh"))


print(paste("hello","world", sep = "-"))


print(paste0("my name","is hitesh "))

```
